channel.title: Client error, please help - New to coding
channel.description:
Right, i need some serious help, i think its my computer thats the problem but here we go
this is my current "Run" doc
[code]@echo off title The Hallows Client java -Xmx300m gui 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
My client has a GUI file, not a client or a JFrame, i dont know if that makes any difference but it seems to be the three that people have after Xmx300m
Please can anyone help? Im only starting off so please dont flame me :/

item.title: Client error, please help - New to coding
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“ethanhello, post:5, topic:433869”]Well when i open it the client just says
Error:cannot find or load man class Gui[/quote]
Seems like you already know what the problem is. I’m guessing this issue comes after you jar it

Read full topic
item.source: Client error, please help - New to coding

item.title: Client error, please help - New to coding
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

MR Terror:

pfft… how can we help you if we dont know the error…

^usually the case.

But you know what’d be better… knowing the problem first; whats your problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Client error, please help - New to coding
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

replace java with “C:\Program Files\java\YOUR JDK Version Here\bin\java.exe”

Read full topic
